      • forClass

        public <T> com.autonomy.aci.client.services.StAXProcessor<T> forClass(Class<T> clazz)
        Returns a processor for the given class. When the StAXProcessor#process method is called the given XMLStreamReader should be on the root field for the class.
        Specified by:
        forClass in interface IdolAnnotationsProcessorFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type which for which a processor will be produced
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class object for which a processor is required
        Returns:
        A StAXProcessor for <T>

      • listProcessorForClass

        public <T> com.autonomy.aci.client.services.StAXProcessor<List<T>> listProcessorForClass(Class<T> clazz)
        Returns a processor which returns a list of objects of type <T>. This processor places no restrictions on the initial state of the XMLStreamReader.
        Specified by:
        listProcessorForClass in interface IdolAnnotationsProcessorFactory
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type which for which a processor will be produced
        Parameters:
        clazz - The class object for which a processor is required
        Returns:
        A StAXProcessor for List<T>

      • setProperties

        public void setProperties(Properties properties)
        Set the properties to use when a configured value is required via a Properties instance. Replaces existing configuration. The new properties will apply to any new processors that are created but will not apply to previously existing ones.
        Specified by:
        setProperties in interface IdolAnnotationsProcessorFactory
        Parameters:
        properties - The Properties object to use for configuration

      • setResourceBundle

        public void setResourceBundle(ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        Set the properties to use when a configured value is required via a ResourceBundle instance. Replaces existing configuration. The new properties will apply to any new processors that are created but will not apply to previously existing ones.

        RENAMED in 0.9.2 to comply with JavaBeans specification

        Specified by:
        setResourceBundle in interface IdolAnnotationsProcessorFactory
        Parameters:
        resourceBundle - The ResourceBundle object to use for configuration
